name: Mantra in the Village Resort

reviews.text: The rooms were clean, there was a balcony overlooking the side street. It was in a great location as all restaurants and beach were walking distance. Breakfast was included at Mango Jam restaurant nearby in our package which was great.
reviews.title: Great location
Great resort/Great Location
reviews.text: We could not fault this resort. Right in the heart of town and very quiet. All of the restaurants and shops right at the doorstep. Apartments very spacious and decor was nice. Staff very friendly and helpful with booking tours and restaurants. We will be back.

aka: Mantra In The Village Hotel Port Douglas
description: Mantra in the Village is located in the heart of Port Douglas and is designed to enhance the tropical climate, featuring a range of hotel rooms and one and two bedroom apartments. Mantra in the Village offers a Greco-style swimming pool perfect for relaxing in after a full day of activity on the Reef or in the Rainforest. Property facilities include: Direct access to shops and Restaurants, Laundry facilities, Pool, Tour desk, Undercover parking.
